Nylon.short_description: Nylon (Polyamide) is a synthetic polymer known for its exceptional strength, elasticity, durability, high abrasion resistance, and quick-drying properties. Common types include Nylon 6 and Nylon 6,6. It can be produced as POY, FDY, DTY, ATY, and staple fiber.
applications: Apparel: Hosiery, lingerie, swimwear, activewear, windbreakers, rainwear, linings
Industrial Uses: Tire cords, ropes, fishing nets and lines, parachutes, conveyor belts, airbags, tents, sleeping bags
Other: Luggage, toothbrushes, sewing threads, sports equipment
